2. Import

import pandas as pd

import missingno as msno

3. Data 불러오기

결측치처리

A.

import sklearn.impute
imputer = sklearn.impute.SimpleImputer(strategy='most_frequent')
df = pd.DataFrame({'A':[1,2,2,np.nan,np.nan,4],'B':['A',np.nan,np.nan,'B','B','B']})
df
A B
0 1.0 A
1 2.0 NaN
2 2.0 NaN
3 NaN B
4 NaN B
5 4.0 B 
imputer.fit_transform(df)
array([[1.0, 'A'],
       [2.0, 'B'],
       [2.0, 'B'],
       [2.0, 'B'],
       [2.0, 'B'],
       [4.0, 'B']], dtype=object)
imputr = sklearn.impute.SimpleImputer()
imputr.fit_transform(df_train[['Age']])
